name: 6 Letters
description:
This is a game created for the Game Jam: A Game By It's Cover 22

This game is based off ※※※※※※ (#113) designed by mituo.

Can you get the password? 6 Letters, 6 clues, all you have to do is observe.

You can see the full game covers here: https://famicase.com/22/

I have provided some hints for you here, but please try and solve as much as you can without!

First Letter Hint A
Have a closer look at the flashing cursor, can you spot a pattern?
First Letter Hint B
Looks like morse code!
Second Letter Hint AUse your cursor and see if you can find a hidden phrase.
Second Letter Hint BThe letters in the hidden phrase looks like they've been shifted across. Maybe look into Ceaser Cipher.
Third Letter Hint AThere's something off about the version number.
Third Letter Hint BWhat's the value at the end?
Fourth Letter Hint ASometimes getting the password wrong is useful!
Fourth Letter Hint BThe wrong password message has an error.
Fifth Letter Hint ATry typing a variety of letters, maybe one will stick out.
Fifth Letter Hint BTyping the right letter in the first four cells will flash on the fifth cell. Time for some brute forcing!
Sixth Letter Hint AThere's a glitch image appearing, maybe this is another type of cipher?
Sixth Letter Hint BMaybe look into the Pigpen Cipher!
